originalText.text: My experience with Dr. Wang, his office staff and adjunct medical personnel was nothing less than exemplary. He literally took the time to explain to me in detail exactly what my problem was and offered his medical advice on a treatment plan. He is a great diagnostician, who was very thorough and extremely professional. I was experiencing severe sciatic pain from a herniated lumbar disc, which he injected with cortisone under image guidance. He was and "ACE" and eliminated my pain. I would not hesitate for a nano second to recommend him and this facility which is heads and tails above any other that I have been to. Dr. Wang, I am blessed to be in your care. My deepest appreciation. Bob

originalText.text: Dr. David Wang has been my physician for many years, through years of epidural shots dealing with spinal stenosis, and now after having had  very serious spine surgery at Hospital for Special Surgery via Dr. Camissa, which was entirely successful, I am back in Dr. Wang's care for Pain Management.  He is and has always been an extremely careful and dedicated Doctor, skillful enough to make my life livable----in short, I recommend Dr. Wang without any reservation whatsoever---

originalText.text:
Dr. Wang is one of the most caring and expert Doctors I have ever visited.

He takes time to show and explain all of what is going on. He is gentle and has changed my life.

His staff is also wonderful. Sandra is the best.

originalText.text: Horrible practice. The receptionist is a liar and i have two family members who are patients that are in the process of trying to find new doctors.
